Education

  • PhD in Information Science.
    Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, The University of Tokyo.
    (April 2007 - October 2009)
    A Study on Attributional and Relational Similarity between Word Pairs on the Web.
    Supervisor: Prof. Mitsuru Ishizuka
    Received the dean's award for the best doctoral thesis
  • Master of Engineering.
    Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, The University of Tokyo.
    (April 2005 - March 2007)
    Improving Coherence in Multi-document Summarization through proper Ordering of Sentences
    Supervisor: Prof. Mitsuru Ishizuka
    Received the dean's award for the best masters thesis
  • Bachelor of Engineering.
    Faculty of Engineering, The University of Tokyo.
    (April 2001 - March 2005)
    A Machine Learning Approach to Sentence Ordering for Multi-document Summarization and its Evaluation.
    Supervisor: Prof. Mitsuru Ishizuka
    Received the dean's award for the best undergraduate thesis

Biography

  • Senior Lecturer (corresponds to US Associate Professor).
    Department of Computer Science, University of Liverpool.
    (August 2013 - Current)
  • Assistant Professor.
    Graduate School of Information Science, The University of Tokyo.
    (April 2010 - August 2013)
  • Visiting Researcher.
    Computer Laboratory, Faculty of Computer Science and Technology, University of Cambridge, UK.
    (April 2011 - June 2011)
    Research on Domain Adaptation for Relation Extraction
    Collaborator: Dr. Simone Teufel
  • Visiting Research Fellow.
    School of Informatics, University of Sussex, UK.
    (January 2010 - December 2010)
    Research on Cross-Domain Sentiment Classification
    Collaborators: Professor John Carroll and Dr. David Weir
  • Post doctoral Research Fellow.
    Japanese Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS), Japan.
    (October 2009 - March 2010)
    Research on Entity Disambiguation on the Web
    Supervisor: Prof. Mitsuru Ishizuka
  • Research Fellow.
    Japanese Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS), Japan.
    (April 2007 - September 2009)
    Research on Entity Disambiguation on the Web
    Supervisor: Prof. Mitsuru Ishizuka
  • Research Assistant.
    National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology, Japan.
    (April 2005 - March 2007)
    Research on Web Data Mining
    Supervisor: Prof. Yutaka Matsuo
  • Foreign Student Scholarship.
    Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology-Japan (MEXT)
    April 2000 - March 2007)

Awards

  2. IEEE Computer Society Japan Chapter Young Author Award 2011.

  3. Best Paper Award at the Genetic and Evolutionary Computation Conference (GECCO 2011).

  4. Best Poster Paper Award at the 11th Pacific Rim International Conference on Artificial Intelligence (PRICAI 2010).

  5. 2010年人工知能学会全国大会優秀賞(Japanese Society for Artificial Intelligence Annual Conference Award year 2010).

  6. 平成22年度東京大学大学院情報理工学系研究科長賞(電子情報学 専攻博士課程)(Award for the best Doctoral Thesis in the Department of Information and Communication Engineering, Graduate School of Information Sciences, The University of Tokyo, Japan. 2010).

  7. 平成１９年度東京大学大学院情報理工学系研究科長賞（電子情報学専攻修士課程） (Award for the best Masters Thesis in the Department of Information and Communication Engineering, Graduate School of Information Sciences, The University of Tokyo, Japan. 2007).

  8. 平成16年度東京大学工学部電子情報工学科優秀卒業論文賞 (Award for the best undergraduate thesis in the Department of Electronics, Electrical and Information Engineering, Faculty of Engineering, University of Tokyo, Japan. 2005).
